data.name: Weapon Forging Station
data.description: A fully-equipped blacksmith's that can accommodate the work of many smiths at once to produce the greatest number of high-quality weapons or repair damaged weaponry most efficiently.\nAs long as monsters still exist on this continent and the wayfaring footsteps of adventurers do not cease, weapons and equipment will always be in demand. To meet this demand, smiths must be trained over many long years, and given that some duds will be produced during this training, it can be quite a huge expense. As such, blacksmiths will at times be strapped for cash, during which the Knights of Favonius will try to secure orders for them to help maintain their quality of life. Rumor has it that a certain farsighted winery owner has also provided some timely injections of capital in the past.

text.text: A sword is the most fundamental unit of strength, and each soldier is indispensable.
A good billet is the key to maintaining a good blade.
So don't be stingy when investing in your smithy.
High-quality ores, a flawless workbench... and an enormous anvil and furnace!
Amazing! It's just as good as Mister Wagner's smithy! You could fix anything here!
Please, let me rent this place!
These facilities will make it much easier to maintain our weapons.
After all, I must be ready for battle at any moment if I am to protect everyone.
Thank you for doing this. You... are also someone I want to protect.
Hunting isn't easy, you know! You need the right techniques and weaponry.
Competent hunters go into the city every week to maintain their weapons, sometimes spending quite a bit of Mora.
With this smithy, ha! I can do maintenance myself.
